title: Jungler Looking for Shen Main, preferably Gold 4+
body:
Hey guys im looking for a Shen main to duo with in which i will play as Nocturne {{champion:56}} .

My concept is that when Nocturne goes for a gank and ults in, shen would follow in with me, essentially instantly bringing the numbers up from a fight by 2.

Easy 4 man bot lane gank, i ult in and shen follow.
Easy 3 mid if their bot ganks mid.
Easy top tower dive in quite some cases, shen taunt in, i go in with ult, shen move out of range then ult to me.

Shen support would also be fine as it would also be a very abusable 3 man top in the event top gets ganked by jg and mid or other cases.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=iammasteryi
This is my op.gg, i average 9.3/3.9/7.9 or 4.37 KDA over 30 games or so as nocturne with roughly 70% win rate.

I believe this can most likely take us to mid platinum at least and i believe diamond is entirely possible.

I am also a somewhat quality yi main in the event nocturne gets banned, i can also play yi, which also goes very well with shen.
Other champions i can do well with in jg are Kha and Kayn.

The duo would preferrably be Gold 4 but i can give exceptions up to no less than Silver 1.

Would also like to duo a few times in draft or flex first if i feel the need to test your skills.

Thanks, add me if anyone wants to give this a shot.
